installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

## File: V Rising Egg - egg-v-rising.json
## Authors: David Wolfe (Red-Thirten), Kapatheus
## Date: 2024/08/02
## License: MIT License
## Image to install with is 'ghcr.io/parkervcp/installers:debian'

# Download and install SteamCMD
export HOME=/mnt/server
cd /tmp
mkdir -p $HOME/steamcmd $HOME/steamapps
curl -sSL -o steamcmd.tar.gz https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
tar -xzvf steamcmd.tar.gz -C $HOME/steamcmd
cd $HOME/steamcmd

# SteamCMD fails otherwise for some reason, even running as root.
# This is changed at the end of the install process anyways.
chown -R root:root /mnt

# Install/Verify game server using SteamCMD
./steamcmd.sh +force_install_dir $HOME +login anonymous $( [[ "${WINDOWS_INSTALL}" == "1" ]] && printf %s '+@sSteamCmdForcePlatformType windows' ) +app_update ${SRCDS_APPID} validate +quit

# Set up 32 and 64 bit libraries
mkdir -p $HOME/.steam/sdk{32,64}
cp -v linux32/steamclient.so $HOME/.steam/sdk32/steamclient.so
cp -v linux64/steamclient.so $HOME/.steam/sdk64/steamclient.so

## V Rising Setup
mkdir -p $HOME/save-data/Settings
# Check for successful installation.
cd $HOME/VRisingServer_Data/StreamingAssets/Settings
if [[ -f ServerHostSettings.json ]]; then
    echo -e "\nV Rising Dedicated Server successfully installed!\n"
else
    echo -e "\n\nSteamCMD failed to install the V Rising Dedicated Server!"
    echo -e "\tTry reinstalling the server again.\n"
    exit 1
fi

variables.name: [Host] Server Query Port
variables.description: UDP port for Steam server list features.

variables.name: [Host] Hide IP Address
variables.description: When listing server on EOS server list, the IP address will not be shown/advertised. Players will connect via relay servers.

variables.name: Automatic Updates
variables.description: Quickly checks for any server updates on startup, and updates if necessary.

variables.name: Game Settings Preset
variables.description: What preset of game settings the server should run. Some settings may not apply after the save file is first created. Leave empty/null if you are using a single-player uploaded save or a custom ServerGameSettings.json file in the `~/save-data/Settings/` directory.

variables.name: Game Difficulty Preset
variables.description: What preset of game difficulty the server should run. Some settings may not apply after the save file is first created. Leave empty/null if you are using a single-player uploaded save or a custom ServerGameSettings.json file in the `~/save-data/Settings/` directory.

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: Name of the server. The name that shows up in server list.

variables.name: Server Description
variables.description: Short server description. Shows up in details panel of server list when entry is selected. Also printed in chat when connecting to server.

variables.name: Max Connected Users
variables.description: Max number of concurrent players on server. The maximum number technically supported is 128.

variables.name: Max Connected Admins
variables.description: Max number of admins to allow connection even when the server is full.

variables.name: Server Password
variables.description: Password required to join the server. Leave blank to have no password.

variables.name: Secure Server
variables.description: Enable VAC protection on server. VAC banned clients will not be able to connect. (true | false)

variables.name: Save Name
variables.description: Name of save file / directory.

variables.name: Auto Save Count
variables.description: Number of autosaves to keep.

variables.name: Auto Save Interval
variables.description: Interval in seconds between each autosave.

variables.name: [Advanced] Server FPS
variables.description: Target FPS for server.

variables.name: [Advanced] Lower FPS When Empty
variables.description: Run the server at a lower framerate target when no players are logged in. (true | false)

variables.name: [Advanced] Lower FPS When Empty Value
variables.description: Set the framerate target for when "[Advanced] Lower FPS When Empty" is active.

variables.name: [Advanced] List On Epic
variables.description: Register on EOS list server or not. The client looks for servers here by default, due to additional features available. (true | false)

variables.name: [Advanced] List On Steam
variables.description: Register on Steam list server or not. (true | false)

variables.name: [RCON] Enable RCON
variables.description: Enable or disable RCON functionality. (true | false) See the following link for info on how to connect and use RCON: https://github.com/StunlockStudios/vrising-dedicated-server-instructions/blob/master/1.0.x/INSTRUCTIONS.md#rcon-1

variables.name: [RCON] RCON Password
variables.description: Password required to connect to RCON if it is enabled.

variables.name: [RCON] RCON Port
variables.description: TCP Port used to connect to RCON. Must be allocated to the server for RCON to work.

variables.name: [Repair] Validate Server Files
variables.description: Leave empty (no value) for OFF or set to "true" for ON. Validates all server files when Automatic Updates is enabled. Note: This will significantly increase server startup times, so it is recommended to only enable this when needed.

variables.name: [System] V Rising Dedicated Server App ID
variables.description: Used for installation and updates. Rarely needs to be changed.

variables.name: [System] Use Windows Branch
variables.description: Tells the installer/updater to only download the Windows branch of the server (the only branch currently available) so that it can run on Wine. Cannot be changed.

variables.name: [System] WINEDEBUG
variables.description: Used to suppress WINE FIXME messages. Rarely needs to be changed.

variables.name: [System] WINEARCH
variables.description: Used for compatibility. Cannot be changed.

variables.name: [System] WINEPATH
variables.description: Used for compatibility. Cannot be changed.
